mapper.insert: insert into lms_class (instructorID, active, className, description, days, tag, closeDate) values (#{instructorID}, #{active}, #{className}, #{description}, #{days}, #{tag}, #{closeDate})
mapper.update: update lms_class set days=days+1 where id=#{id}
update lms_class set days=days-1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from lms_class where instructorID=#{instructorID} and active=1
select * from lms_class where instructorID=#{instructorID} and active=0
